# Assignment 2

```{r}
install.packages("tidyverse")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
install.packages("Stat2Data")
```

```{r}
library(Stat2Data)
data("Hawks")
```

```{r}
hawksSmall<-drop_na(select(Hawks,Age,Day,Month,Year,CaptureTime,Species,Wing,Weight,Tail))
```

```{r}
head(hawksSmall,5)
```

```{r}
 ggplot(data=hawksSmall,aes(x=Weight))+geom_histogram(binwidth=100)+
  xlab("Weight (gm)")+ylab("Count")
```
